file_content.text: For the new Empire!
I haven't enjoyed myself this much since the Sacking of Coruscant.
Enough games!
Impressive, but it won't be enough.
Feel an Emperor's wrath!
Thank you again for dealing with Darth Arho. You certainly made my job easier.
I hear the Grand Moff is calling me Malgus the Betrayer. Tell me, did my deception sting?
I should have killed you on Ilum when I had the chance.
Come, my friends!
Show our strength!
Fight by my side! Fight for our Empire!
You will join me in death, as will your Republic fleet.
Your fleet is doomed. And with it, the old Empire.
Come, Master Jedi. Witness your fleet's destruction.
Your fleet has failed you, Major.
Approach, Captain. Watch your fleet's final moments.
Come. Watch the final moments of your Republic fleet.
Even without our flux cannons, my stealth fighters are crippling your pathetic armada.
Your capital ships are no match for this station's superlasers. The rest will fall to my stealth armada.
Soon the Republic's failure will be complete, and nothing will stand in the way of the new Empire.
If I allow your Empire to succeed, I'll be failing those I swore to protect.
I will stand in your way.
You have already failed, Jedi.
The Empire will kill you for this treason. But the Republic can offer you safety, and a home for your ideals.
I sense your doubt.
You're reaching, Jedi.
Tell your armada to stand down, and we can end this peacefully.
Call them off.
You are in no place to negotiate, Major.
You're forgetting one obstacle to your new Empire: me.
Famous last words.
Don't make me laugh, Captain.
You've sacrificed everything to build this "new Empire," and for what?
Why are you doing this?
For the Empire, of course. It must survive, even if that means burning it to the ground and forging one anew from the ash.
You're delusional, Malgus.
My plans are completely lucid.
Warning: Shields shutting down. Station defenses offline.
Arkis Wode! Well played.
Our fleet will concentrate their fire on your station and destroy your vision of a new Empire.
The tides have turned.
Yes. Let them come in close for the kill.
Lay down your weapons, and I'll call off the fleet.
You can still surrender.
You overestimate your chances of success.
Is the Emperor nervous?
Thanks to you, the Republic fleet has been lured into firing range, and their defeat accelerated. But what prompted your suicidal attack?
Does the Republic fear me? Do nightmares of a united, emboldened Empire keep your leaders awake at night?
Enough of your deception!
No! [Strike him]
You've poisoned the galaxy with your lies long enough!
Enough, Dark Lord! [Strike]
Fear this!
Do I look afraid? [Strike him]
You want nightmares? I'll give you nightmares!
Not a chance. [Strike him]
Enough.
It's fear of the Republic that drives you to build a stronger Empire.
You are the fearful one.
You mistake fear for fury.
You're pathetic, Malgus.
I will teach you respect.
Emergency warning: Safety overrides disengaged. Power core set to self-destruct.
This station will explode, consuming your entire fleet. And from the wreckage of the once-mighty Republic, a new Empire will be born!
It doesn't have to end this way, Malgus.
Stop the countdown.
I--and only I--can stop the meltdown at any time. Kill me, and your precious fleet is lost.
You wouldn't sacrifice this station if you expected to survive.
A desperate move.
I alone can stop the destruction cycle. Kill me, and your fleet is doomed.
This ends now.
Die, Malgus!
Come. Show me the strength of your Republic.
The Emperor's Wrath. Fitting that we meet within his chambers. He was kind enough to keep his throne warm for me.
We meet again, Darth Nox.
We meet again, Darth Imperius.
We meet again, Darth Occlus.
Finally, the Empire's faithful, stubborn servant.
We meet again, mercenary.
You're as stubborn as the dying Empire.
Welcome to my throne room. So much history. So many glory days that slipped away from us.
The Emperor is dead. Long live the new Emperor.
You are no Emperor of mine!
Never! [Strike Malgus]
It is you who will bow to me, Malgus!
Never! [Strike Malgus]
And justify a false Emperor's treason? I think not!
Never! [Strike Malgus]
I bow to no Emperor!
Never! [Strike Malgus]
Kneel.
You've defiled that throne long enough.
You're a traitor, nothing more.
You will address the Emperor with respect. It is proper.
I respect your perseverance, Malgus, but not your claim to power.
Fine. I'll play along.
Join your "ally" in supplication.
You're not as foolish as you look.
The Empire is withering away. Yet you, an alien, would sacrifice everything to protect your oppressors from changing.
The Empire is withering away. Soon it will be obliterated by decadence and antiquated ideals. Yet still you struggle to keep it from healing.
Don't you see? Our survival demands a new Empire, tempered by alien alliances and strengthened by tolerance.
The Empire is already rife with weakness. If you invite further incompetence, your Empire will be doomed.
Such is the path to failure.
You surround yourself with alien yes-men to bolster your confidence. But you're scared and weak--the traits of a doomed Emperor.
I sense your fear, Malgus.
Your perception is lacking.
Your vision is quaint, but unrealistic. An inclusive Empire will be torn apart by a million voices screaming for equality.
Idealism will get you nowhere.
You're as blind as the Grand Moff.
Exclusivity's what makes the Empire strong. I could've signed on with the Republic if all I wanted was a warm hug.
You just don't get it.
Don't attempt to coach me on politics, mercenary.
I've seen the Empire's weakness. We must change to survive, but you're going about it the wrong way.
You may be right, to a point.
You know the Dark Council would never willingly relinquish their power.
The galaxy's full of independent contractors looking for a side, but your revolution's just encouraging their disrespect.
I agree, to a point.
You are perceptive, but you still have much to learn.
Your "new Empire" is a joke.
I grow weary of your company.
My stealth armada will destroy your fleet, and I will destroy you.
Warning: Critical explosions detected on the Foundry level. Generators manually overloaded by user ID Arkis Wode.
Enough.
Emergency warning: Power core overrides engaged. Self-destruct initiated.
Malgus the Betrayer, in the name of the Empire, I will destroy you!
Your reign ends now! [Attack]
The Empire sent me to kill the false Emperor, and I finish jobs.
You're finished. [Attack]
You must be desperate to sacrifice your entire station.
Giving up already?
This palace is a monument to the old Empire's failures. Its sacrifice was inevitable.
You'll kill millions, Malgus.
Their deaths will be on your hands.
Self-destruct? Seriously?
The loss of this battle station is insignificant if it seeds the Empire's change.
The blast will wipe out your fleet, and only I can deactivate the destruction cycle.
Die or defeat me. Either way, the Empire is reborn.
Your fleet is finished.
